actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to add to the list of import-sensitive articles that may not be designed as articles eligible for duty-free treatment under title V of the Trade Act of 1974.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to add sulfanilic acid to the list of import-sensitive articles that may not be designated as articles eligible for duty-free treatment under the Generalized System of Preferences.

titles.title: A bill to add to the list of import-sensitive articles that may not be designed as articles eligible for duty-free treatment under title V of the Trade Act of 1974.
